column1: The '''South Downs''' was a range of hills that ran through the central regions of [[Eriador]]. They were a dreary, empty land with scarce vegetation.<ref>{{FR

Walking along the [[East-West Road]] from [[Bree]] to the [[Weather Hills]], one could see the Downs to the south. The [[Greenway]], running through the [[Andrath]], separated the South Downs from the [[Barrow-downs]].<ref>{{HM
